name: places/ChIJX5as-INZwokRougvXHif7VM
formattedAddress: 227 E 3rd St, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 227 E 3rd St, New York, NY 10009, USA

originalText.text:
The Executive Director of this company is so unprofessional and petty. We tend to say the company is unprofessional but it's the people. It starts from above. I recently was hired as a supervisor. Me being new I do not know the ins & outs of the company as of yet. Emails are coming through non-stop. However, I received an email from April L PHILLIPS pertaining to something called a welcome Kit. Upon me opening the attachment I noticed my name was spelled incorrectly. I made Ms. Phillips aware of this situation. So there was a few emails that went out but at the same time, this person who is supposed to be professional and understanding. Could of told me directly she didn't have a answer to my questions. She pretended to answer as if she was reassuring me. Lastly, she gets upset with my questions and dismissed me with enjoy the rest of your day. Next thing I know I'm terminated without a reason, without full communication. Mind you they spelled my name incorrectly and when I tried to fix the situation because it is an important document You then get upset. I was asked to sign and fill it out you did not like my response. You then have the nerve to throw in there your title.
You are weak, and sad. Your company is losing out on good people because of. The negativity.and the power that is being abused. Women run the world
But when you do ignorant and petty stuff, it becomes personal.
Talking about helping families. Lol preventive services, you guys just care about money especially this person who's supposed to be a leader.

originalText.text: This place is very u professional. My sister was told to come in for an interview yesterday. When she showed up in her wheelchair the employees were laughing at her. The woman that was supposed to interview her wouldn’t interview her and sent someone else who didn’t ask her any questions and rushed through the interview. My sister was over qualified for that position with her master’s degree and she felt she was being discriminated which isn’t fair. My sister is paralyzed from the waist down but that doesn’t mean she can’t work. As she was leaving she asked an employee there how did the hiring process go for him and he basically told her she wouldn’t get the job due to her condition. So rude and unprofessional!!!They don’t even deserve one star. They should be a shamed of themselves!!!!
